Cooperation.body: At Hydro, collaboration is a fundamental value that drives our innovation and development. We believe that when experts from different fields come together, we can create intelligent aluminum solutions that meet our customers' needs. Our structure promotes collaboration across our global organization, enabling employees to share experiences and insights that enhance our collective outcomes. This focus on collaboration is essential for optimizing our processes, strengthening our products, and ensuring that we can address the challenges facing the aluminum industry today.
